addr: 3rd Floor, Colechurch House. 1 London Bridge Walk. London SE1 2SX GB
title: Payments 101 - May
desc: Led by industry expert  Neira Jones , this interactive one-day course will take you through the fundamentals of the payments ecosystem, from cards to ACH to alternative payments and debunk the jargon. It will also give you an overview of the payments value chain to gain a grasp of the key economics and take you through a whistle stop tour of the regulatory landscape. ? Who is it for? With a combination of presenter led?sessions, videos and Q&A session, this intensive course will leave you with reference material you will be able to use for a long time. Fees include refreshments, lunch and certificate of attendance Whether you are already a payments professional wanting to gain an appreciation of all aspects of payments, or a new entrant trying to get a reference base, this course is for you.
